short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currently adds a remove page button to the submissions page on FA which removes all submissions listed on that page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds additional functionality to the FurAffinity website.

Current functionality added:
 - A remove page button has been added to the submissions page

Patch notes:
 - Now supports both HTTP and HTTPS
